game

类 Connect4

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Connect4

  • public class Connect4
extends java.lang.Object
    Connect4 class represents the logic for the Connect4 game. It manages the game state, players, and interactions such as placing pieces, checking if the game is won or drawn, and switching between players.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static char BLUE 
      static char RED 

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Connect4(int mode)
      Initializes a new Connect4 game with the given mode.
      Connect4(int mode, Player player1, Player player2)
      Initializes a Connect4 game with given game mode and two players
      Connect4(Player player1, Player player2)
      Initializes a Connect4 game with two given players

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Response<GameState> dropChecker(int column)
      Drops a checker piece in the specific column and returns the updated game state.
      Response<GameState> getGameState()
      Gets game board and current player
      Response<Player> getWinningInfo()
      Returns information about current game state, including if there is a winner
      Response<java.lang.Boolean> resetGame()
      Resets current game to its initial state
      Response<java.lang.String> setPlayerName(Player player, java.lang.String name)
      Sets a player's name
      Response<GameState> startGame()
      Returns current game state and status code information.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Connect4

        public Connect4(int mode)
         throws GameException
        Initializes a new Connect4 game with the given mode.
        参数:
        mode - 1. mode==1 human vs human 2. mode==2 human vs computer 3. mode==3 computer vs computer
        抛出:
        GameException - if the game mode is invalid

      • Connect4

        public Connect4(Player player1,
                Player player2)
        Initializes a Connect4 game with two given players
        参数:
        player1 - The instance of the first player
        player2 - The instance of the second player

      • Connect4

        public Connect4(int mode,
                Player player1,
                Player player2)
         throws GameException
        Initializes a Connect4 game with given game mode and two players
        参数:
        mode - game mode 1, 2, or 3
        player1 - The instance of the first player
        player2 - The instance of the second player
        抛出:
        GameException - if the game mode is invalid

    • 方法详细资料

      • startGame

        public Response<GameState> startGame()
        Returns current game state and status code information.
        返回:
        A response object containing current game state and code

      • setPlayerName

        public Response<java.lang.String> setPlayerName(Player player,
                                                java.lang.String name)
        Sets a player's name
        参数:
        player - The player whose name should be changed
        name - The new name for this player
        返回:
        A response object containing status code and message

      • dropChecker

        public Response<GameState> dropChecker(int column)
                                throws GameException
        Drops a checker piece in the specific column and returns the updated game state.
        参数:
        column - The column where the piece should be dropped
        返回:
        A response object containing updated board and player information
        抛出:
        GameException - if the move is invalid

      • getWinningInfo

        public Response<Player> getWinningInfo()
        Returns information about current game state, including if there is a winner
        返回:
        A response object containing status code and current winner(if the game has a winner)

      • getGameState

        public Response<GameState> getGameState()
        Gets game board and current player
        返回:
        A response object containing status code and game status

      • resetGame

        public Response<java.lang.Boolean> resetGame()
        Resets current game to its initial state
        返回:
        A response object indicating success or failure
